setAllowedCategories(ChannelCategory...) - Method in class me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.Command
Sets the categories where the command will be allowed
If the not allowed categories has been set this will not take any effect.

Sets the channels where the command will be allowed
If the not allowed commands has been set this will not take any effect.

If the not allowed users has been set this will not take any effect.

setRoles(boolean, Role...) - Method in class me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.Command
Sets the roles which can use this command with
Does not take any effect when the command sent in private
setRoleSource(Server) - Method in class me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.Command
Sets the server where the roles will be fetched from
This is useful when we want to check the roles at a private command Safe to use when the command is registered in only one server
